title: Giro d’Italia Rewind: Faces of Pain and the 2010 Muddy Apocalypse Across the White Roads of Tuscany
content:
World champion Cadel Evans (BMC Racing Team) outsprints a select group of contenders to win stage 7 of the 2010 Giro d’Italia as Alexander Vinokourov regains the overall lead.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Rewind: Faces of Pain and the 2010 Muddy Apocalypse Across the White Roads of Tuscany on Velo.
author: VeloNews.com
